paragraphs: This document provided a detailed walkthrough on creating a purchase order, approving it, and receiving merchandise against it.
By following these steps, you can efficiently manage your inventory and ensure accurate stock levels.

paragraphs: This document outlines the process of creating a Purchase Order (PO), approving the PO, and receiving merchandise against the created PO within the system. Purchase Orders are used to manage and track inventory procurement.
This guide is intended for users responsible for inventory management, procurement, and receiving within the organization.
outcomes: Receive merchandise against a Purchase Order.
prerequisites: User must have appropriate roles and permissions to access the Inventory and Purchase Order modules.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Purchase Orders section to begin the PO creation process.
Steps / How-To.step: In the left navigation sidebar, click on 'Inventory'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Access the Purchase Orders list.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on 'Purchase Orders' under the 'Inventory' section.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Initiate the creation of a new Purchase Order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Create PO' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a vendor for the Purchase Order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'Vendor Code' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose the appropriate vendor from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a vendor from the dropdown list, for example, 'Cosmetics'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's phone number.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter a phone number in the 'Phone' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's address.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor's address in the 'Vendor Address' textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the date for the PO.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the 'PO Due Date' field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a date from the calendar and click 'Ok'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter any specific terms for the vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor terms in the 'Vendor Terms' textarea, for example, 'Ship within 2 weeks'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the date for vendor ship.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the 'Vendor Ship By Date' field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a date from the calendar and click 'Ok'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the date for PO expiration.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the 'PO Expiration Date' field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a date from the calendar and click 'Ok'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the location for the PO.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'Location' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose the appropriate location from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a location from the dropdown list, for example, 'Kerala'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the store for the PO.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'Location' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose the appropriate store from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a store from the dropdown list, for example, 'Kollam Store'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the PO terms.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'PO Terms' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the shipping address.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the shipping address in the 'Shipping Address' textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the shipping comments.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'Shipping Comments' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose the appropriate shipping comments from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Select shipping comments from the dropdown list, for example, 'Ship all the Items to the Kerala Warehouse'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the freight terms.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'Freight Terms' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose the appropriate freight terms from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Select freight terms from the dropdown list, for example, 'Freight only'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Open the item lookup to add items to the PO.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Item Lookup' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select items from the item lookup.
Steps / How-To.step: Select the checkbox next to the desired items.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the items.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Select Items' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the quantity of the item.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the quantity in the 'QTY Received' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Approve the Purchase Order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Approve' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter PO approval notes.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter notes in the 'PO approval notes' textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Confirm the approval.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'APPROVE' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Send the Purchase Order to the vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Send To Vendor' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Merchandise Receiving section.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on 'Merchandise Receiving' under the 'Inventory' section.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Initiate the receiving process.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Receive Merchandise' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'Vendor' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose the appropriate vendor from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a vendor from the dropdown list, for example, 'Cosmetics Vendor'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the PO.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the 'PO #' input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Choose the appropriate PO from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Select a PO from the dropdown list, for example, '2025/6/2/38'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the quantity received.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the quantity in the quantity input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Save the merchandise receiving document.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Save' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Confirm the receiving.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'RECEIVE' button.
